channel.title: [FIXED] How to make all of an NPC's HP show in one bar
channel.description:
I recently changed my RSPS coding base from Hybrid PvP to one called InsidiaX.
One Hybrid PvP, when I change the amount of HP an NPC has, it just adds it onto the HP bar, thus; -When Corporeal Beast has 100 HP, the HP bar depletes very quickly as I used a strong player to kill it, and it had just the one HP bar. -When Corporeal Beast has 3,000 HP, the HP bar takes much longer to empty as I attack it, yet it still has just the one bar, and it doesn't refill when I finish the first one off.
THIS IS WHAT I WANT TO HAPPEN ON MY NEW BASE ^^^^
However, when I set Corp's HP to 3,000 on my new base, it goes through multiple HP bars that keep on replenishing as I finish the last one off.
I would like to know how to change this so all 3,000 HP is displayed in one HP bar, not 5 (or whatever the number of bars it is)
Another way of looking at this is that I would like to increase the maximum HP allowed in one HP bar (if that's what the problem is. It may just be that there is code somewhere to tell it to split into more that 1 bar, I don't know :s)
As I got no response on my last topic, I would be VERY happy if I got a helpful answer on this :)
Thanks so much in advance,
Idznak :3
------------------------------------------------------------------
EDIT:
I found out how to fix it, I had to follow this guide
http://google.com/runescape-development/google/tutorials/62427-npc-hp-bar-fix-stop-repeatedly-refilling.html
If anyone gets an error that the variable "misc" isn't found after adding the HP fix into NPC.java, change the "m" to a capital on "misc.getCurrentHP(HP, MaxHP, 100));"
so it reads
[code]//HP Bar Fix by Unborn str.writeByteS(Misc.getCurrentHP(HP, MaxHP, 100)); str.writeByteC(100);[/code]
It doesn't like "misc" with a small "m" :P
